tensortrade.env.default.rewards moduleÂ¶

class tensortrade.env.default.rewards.PBR(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Bases: tensortrade.env.default.rewards.TensorTradeRewardScheme

A reward scheme for position-based returns.

  • Let \(p_t\) denote the price at time t.

  • Let \(x_t\) denote the position at time t.

  • Let \(R_t\) denote the reward at time t.

Then the reward is defined as, \(R_{t} = (p_{t} - p_{t-1}) \cdot x_{t}\).

Parameters

price (Stream) â€“ The price stream to use for computing rewards.

portfolio (Portfolio) â€“ The portfolio associated with the TensorTradeActionScheme.

float â€“ The reward for the current step of the episode.

class tensortrade.env.default.rewards.RiskAdjustedReturns(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Bases: tensortrade.env.default.rewards.TensorTradeRewardScheme

A reward scheme that rewards the agent for increasing its net worth, while penalizing more volatile strategies.

Parameters

  • return_algorithm ({'sharpe', 'sortino'}, Default 'sharpe'.) â€“ The risk-adjusted return metric to use.

  • risk_free_rate (float, Default 0.) â€“ The risk free rate of returns to use for calculating metrics.

  • target_returns (float, Default 0) â€“ The target returns per period for use in calculating the sortino ratio.

  • window_size (int) â€“ The size of the look back window for computing the reward.
